title: The ‘Big Little Lies’ Season 2 Premiere and the Debacle That Was ‘Dark Phoenix’ | The Watch
description:
‘Big Little Lies’ is back for Season 2 (0:34). Meryl Streep seems to be just what the show needed (6:12), and we check in with the rest of the Monterey Five (14:01). Plus: How did Fox get ‘Dark Phoenix’ so wrong (25:00)?

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Amanda Dobbins and Jason Concepcion

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
